## CubemapSHProjector.(constructor)

Creates a new CubemapSHProjector instance.

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

<tbody><tr><td>

numSamples


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Number of Monte Carlo samples to use for SH projection. Higher values provide better accuracy but slower computation. Default is 10000.
